entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NW 35 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
